column1: Smoque BBQ////Really enjoyed the ribs. The long wait was kind of interesting in the people watching Department. If your looking for a relaxing meal this probably is not the place. ..... But of coarse we are talking about cave man Ribs mentality here
column3: the sauce was way to vinegar for me. If I could only combine these ribs with Fat Willy's Sauce I would be in Rib heaven. So check it out but be prepared for a line and cafeteria style ordering and a bunch of happy cave people.
